website_summaries.verdict: Popular among endoscope users, this best-selling model boasts a longer battery time than most as well as superior color temperature.
pros: Captures images from farther away than other scopes
Metal attachments screw securely onto the head of the camera
Works just as well as models several times more expensive
cons: Image will not be clear when extremely close up
Some users report problems with initial app installation, doing it several times before succeeding

customer_reviews.title: Andoid app hacks your phone! Read and see screen shot!
customer_reviews.text: According to McAfee Security, the latest version of the Android App contains a trojan called Android. SpyAgent.NK The trojan has the capability of allowing someone to control your phone remotely or encrypt your data for ransom. Look at my screen shot for more information. I contacted Depstech and no body has responded. I also contacted Google the have the app removed from the playstore.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Innamarato

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for a very useful product for a very good price. I use it for a back-up camera/rear mount dashcam in my 2007 Jeep.
customer_reviews.author: PSH

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t stand the test of time
customer_reviews.text: The concept of this was great. I used it for law enforcement purposes and it allowed me to access areas that would’ve been impossible to see without it. But I was truly disappointed as to the durability of the product. It worked without a hitch for the first 6 months and deadlined on me. The light dimmed, then it flat out wouldn’t connect to the phone even after I rebooted it, removed and reinstalled the app, and let the battery die out and recharged it. I’ll see if the manufacturer will consider replacing or exchanging the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paid for itself 10 times over in the first use for sewer line inspection
customer_reviews.text: Found the root cause of my sewer blockages and I was able to address the issues and verify the camera. Cheaper then renting an inspection camera by 4 fold.
customer_reviews.author: siliconvalley

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I have never been able to make it work. It is discoverable on my iPhone, but does not respond to the password shown on the instruction sheet, and on the product case. Why a password that does not do anything? Clearly my fault for assuming that I was doing something wrong, and getting past the return date. But now that several of my teenage grandchildren have tried and not been successful . I am really disappointed that it failed to transmit an image. It does have little LEDs that indicate that it has taken a charge, and is "on", but without an image that is not very important.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Crumm

customer_reviews.title: Terrible image quality
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this gadget as it’s a neat idea but I guess you get what you pay for. The image is decent if you’re just pointing it around the room, but once you stick it into a wall or pipe with no light, you can’t see a thing besides blurry images. I confirmed the LED lights were on, and they help slightly, but they don’t seem bright enough to actually be useful. You’ll end up staring at pictures that look like the one I’ve posted (that was taken inside a 2” pvc pipe). Unfortunately I had to return this as it’s pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: low refresh rate + low resolution
customer_reviews.text: refresh rate 1 frame every 30 seconds. the camera wouldn’t switch resolutions so it was stuck in vga super low resolution. sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: WiFi is junk!
customer_reviews.text: One hour later I still cannot connect to WiFi. Blue WiFi is lit on power adapter but keep getting the dreaded “Set Fail” with SSID, Password, or anything else. Instructions are minimal and do not address the failure to connect. I was leary at purchasing a system that connects to WiFi and you should be too. Time to pack it back up. Junk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent little boroscope very pleased
customer_reviews.text: as with nearly all boroscope's this one fogs up after a few minutes, but aside from that it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Taylor

customer_reviews.title: As the instructions suggest it is better to operate the wifi in the absence of other ...
customer_reviews.text: It took a total of under 2 minutes to set it up including app download. Worked exactly as advertised. I used it to inspect septic drainage pipes and clearly could see drainage holes, small root intrusions with a very large depth of focus. No comments on its longevity and reliability as I have had it only for 1 day. As the instructions suggest it is better to operate the wifi in the absence of other strong wifi as the wifi connection to the phone seems to be affected.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Low quality components
customer_reviews.text: I liked the prospect of a fair product at an inexpensive price. First of all the software is a joke, second is that the battery/control case is flimsy plastic, third the brightness control failed in 15 minutes. If this item was made of slightly better components it would be occasionally useable. It was mediocre at best and I would not recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: It works and does the job
customer_reviews.text: My time driving this scope has been a bit limited so far but it does appear to be a handy item to have. From my first experience using it I was not super impressed with the lighting. The image quality was OK but nothing to write home about. Under some circumstances it may be great but I have limited drive time so I cannot say for sure. It works fine for the price. The directions are a little less clear than I would like but it just takes reading them a couple of times and thinking things through to get on with the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Not what I needed but great service
customer_reviews.text: Camera not HD enough and just overall poor video. App was easy to use but camera just not worth it. I need to be able to look at small objects size of small ants clearly and this one doesn't provide what I needed. Fun for a toy and maybe other use but not for me. UPDATE: customer service reached out to me to see how to make things right and even promptly refunded my money. I am sure this is a great fit for someone just not my particular need for finding very small insects in leaves. Thanks for the great service either way.
customer_reviews.author: RWP72

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: The setup is pretty simple once you figure it out. I was not able to setup using the instructions but viewed a tutorial on Youtube which clarified everything. The company does offer support if needed. I used the endoscope to look for termite activity under a sink cabinet, the larger the hole drilled, the easier it is to maneuver the scope. I wish the LED light was a little brighter for more clarity of the picture and it takes a slow steady hand to maneuver the scope, otherwise the picture is a bit blurry. I will be using it again later, maybe it takes some practice to use it properly but overall, I am satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.author: GuyY

customer_reviews.title: You can’t get something for NOTHING...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for a toy project; actually, great CAMERA overall. As far as the product goes...that’s another issue entirely. But first, using a 1-5 Likert score (with 5 representing Excellent, and 1 Horrible) I’ll try to quickly hone in on what’s relevant and what’s not. Cost: 5 Materials included: 5 Setup/Install/Download: 5 Camera quality: 4 Ease of use: 1 Life Span: 1 Noticeably, everything scored rather well; but when taken into consideration that it is so incredibly flimsy, it was akin to using a wet noodle, not to mention the length of the scope was both pointless and time consuming — I “used” it for 2 days before tossing it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Attachments don't fit
customer_reviews.text: [Updating review due to excellent customer service. After seeing my review the vendor offered complete replacement. They sent new 5pc attachment set which all fit perfectly. Thanks!] I needed the right angle mirror but it was impossible to screw on. I tried for a long time and only got it onto one thread (and scratched up the black enamel trying to hold the thing). The other ones screwed on fine (the hook was tight) but the mirror has to be all the way on to work properly. Otherwise, it a pretty slick device for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertized with exception of cable distance coverage
customer_reviews.text: Crawl space below house was barely high enough for a child to maneuver in, much less an old man. Needed to run electrical wire under house. lighting provided by the camera provided just enough light to see 15' to edge wall. Adding a spot light as secondary light improved the picture greatly. Point being camera was able to show the wall from that distance. Anything viewed closer was a piece of cake then. Not 5 star because the cable is not rigid enough to keep the probe straight at distances greater than 6'. A 6' piece of 1/2" pvc allowed extension to 12'.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K Haase

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I did use this for the reason I purchased it and it worked well, though difficult to tell top for bottom in some uses. I was looking inside a wall above an electrical panel to see where the wiring was entering the header plate. I was able to determine where I needed to be once in the attic to drill another access hole. The battery life is terrible. This could be a good product if it came with a longer life, quick charge battery.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Camera doesn't connect, blank screen, phone app is bad.
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't function properly. I followed all the directions to the letter and most of the time, it fails to connect and I only see a blank screen. The few times it succeeds, it freezes after a few minutes. I have not been able to use this product, which is a shame because I really want to see into my sewer pipe. I tried the depstech and the wifi view application, fully charged the battery, turned off my mobile data, tried airplane mode with only wifi enabled, rebooted my phone and the camera numerous times, and it just doesn't work. The wifi light blinks but no picture shows up.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: Would be a 5 star if the wire was more rigid
customer_reviews.text: After about 12' this thing is like pushing a wet noodle up a pipe. I bought the 30' version and I probably should just went for half that length, b/c you honestly can't control it longer than that. I ended up taping it to my metal fish line to get more rigidity. Other than that, this thing is worth it. I paid a plumber $275 to test for leaks and issues in my plumbing before buying my house. Not that this detects leaks, but it does an excellent job of seeing inside your plumbing for obvious damage from tree roots, foundation problems, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Nick M.

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect to WiFi!
customer_reviews.text: Upon first connecting to wifi at my parent's house, I was successful. When, brought it home to set up on my wifi, I could not get the camera to connect to my phone or even an iPad. I tried uninstalling program, reinstalling and resetting wifi using the reset pin button. I wanted very much to use this to inspect my chimney flue and check the vents of an older HVAC system. It's been over a year and I'm just now able to reach out to see if anyone could help? The training video that is supposedly available, is no longer accessable. The Facebook fan videos do not really help with a step by step process.
customer_reviews.author: CarlS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and setup.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use but the initial setup is a bit confusing. The short of it is you first download their app, no direct connection to your phone with the camera. Turn on the camera and wait for both red and blue lights. Blue shows the WiFi is on. Go to your WiFi settings on your phone for the cameras WiFi name to pop up. Sign into it with the supplied password. Go back to your phone and look at their app... you’re now seeing the camera image. The one item I was surprised with the led is that the tip gets quite hot.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Works good and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived promptly and is as described. Seems to be a decent quality. The computer program seemed simple enough to navigate and set up. I used it twice with moderate success. The storm drains I was inspecting did not have sweeping 90's so after the first 90 things got difficult and I had to abandon my efforts. Both ends of the pipe are accessible and I will need to use a fish tape or a vacuum with bag and pull line. I just have not got around to finishing my investigation - not the products fault.
customer_reviews.author: Skull

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for dad and it was simple to set up and use--literally one, two, three. The ONLY thing I do not like is the password/code it has. It is unnecessary confuses my dad thinking he has to use his wifi password not the device password---which I honestly don't understand why it has one. Using the device is a piece of cake--it's going to be fun for him to use around the house on his cars, and with the grandkids when they want to see whats down a turtle or snake hole!!! Love the fact it can be used in the water as well!
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but has major flaws
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to inspect duct work, given that it's advertised as SEMI-RIGID and there's even a picture of a lady inspecting air conditioning. In the real world, despite being somewhat rigid, the cable loses it's strength once you feed about 2 feet of it. So the remaining length of the cable is pretty useless in this case. Otherwise the camera quality i think is sufficient for inspection. I will probably return it for a smaller unit since having all the extra length is not useful, unless you use fish tape, fish rods, or some other method to anchor the camera in order to feed through duct work of more than 2 feet.
customer_reviews.author: sanja

customer_reviews.title: From delivery to using, took about a minute to load app and use. Simple.
customer_reviews.text: Simple app, really well thought out device. Used to see this type if boroscope costing $600 plus and this is better. Since it's wireless, even easier to use. We left the scope in the kitchen and walked over 80' OUTSIDE and still had reception. From bird houses to sewer lines, engine inspections, plumbing, chimney and ductwork peeks to inside wall wiring, this is great. Go for the 10 meter length... the cable is semi rigid and you never know when you'll need it.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbaloooo

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for plumbing
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps someone with more experience would have been successful, but I wasn't able to get a clear picture of what is going on in some 5" PVC lines for buried downspouts in my yard. The cable wasn't rigid enough to travel through the pipe, and the picture just went dark under water, even with the light on high. I was able to return the item without any issues, which is the reason for the 2 star, rather than 1 star, rating. This could be useful for other applications, like duct work, but I wouldn't recommend it for drain lines, especially those with standing water.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: very cool product
customer_reviews.text: after ordering two WiFi endoscopes. Depstech sent me a free WiFi Borescope Inspection Camera. this thing is freaking awesome. its great for checking inside your ears, nose and throat. it has an amazing picture quality. i love this thing. The only thing I think they should have done was made it usable with the same app that is used for the endoscope. you have to download a different app which i didn't like. overall very cool product!
customer_reviews.author: Jlista

customer_reviews.title: Downloaded the app, it connected right away to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded the app, it connected right away to my phone. Pictures are clear, helped me find a break in my swimming pool return line that saved tons of digging. Used it to look at the sewer line to find where that was broken, again saved tons of digging or hundreds of $'s to pay someone to come and do that for me. At 10 meters it is plenty long enough to reach many areas you need, you may just need to go in at different locations to get the complete picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: got to know how to read
customer_reviews.text: be careful when reading the instructions. I read them them 4 times before i figured out it was telling me to use the phone settings instead of the app settings in order to get it to work. I got it to work and the picture quality is good from what i saw and it will get the job done before i spend a 1000.00 dollars for a plummer to fix a leaky water drain. it will also come in handy for other projects as well, such as engine rebuilds . pretty cool item. recomend, but heed my warning!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It tried ...
customer_reviews.text: I really needed this to work well because I have a downspout into my foundation and have no idea where it pops out. I wanted to use this ti find it but the camera is so blurry I cannot tell what I am looking at. It's blurry even after cleaning the lenses. I gave up on it and returned.
customer_reviews.author: NickyCymbals

customer_reviews.title: Good Service. Just a Couple Things to Improve
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am mostly satisfied with this endoscope. My two main problems are the facts that although a computer can connect to its built-in Wifi, no program that I am aware of can stream the signal. Also, the phone app is not able to record video in the highest resolution. It records, but the file is - more or less - empty. On the plus side, Depstech offered me one of their USB models for free as a workaround for the no-stream-to-computer problem. Its works well with VLC, in either Windows or Linux. (Go into Capture Device and then set Capture Mode and Video Device Name).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: You will use it more than you think.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool. Works as it says. I will say it’s a little squirrelly to guide. I don’t think I’ve ever used more than 10 feet at one time, so I probably could have got a shorter length. I had visions of putting it down my pipes, the problem is it can be difficult to get to go thru elbows and when it does it usually gets something on the lens and has to be -pulled back out to be cleaned. But I continue to find ways to use it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. gets hot. works great.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good Borescope. Easy to use software and detaches from the battery. Maybe the range of focus is a little long. I can see clearly at about 8 inches. I'd prefer to macro, but thats not what I purchased. Camera gets hot, but thats just because of the LED's
customer_reviews.author: Peter Merry

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for in-wall wiring. Also fun to play with.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first endoscope, I didn’t have any expectations but this thing is awesome. I have an iPhone X and it connected with no problems. I played with it and annoyed my wife for a few minutes by showing her my cavities then I tried using it in my walls. I used it to run wires in wall from my 1st floor to basement. I used the app to record video of the journey. I didn’t even know that was a feature until I had it in my hands. I was so impressed I took it to work for show and tell. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Slob

customer_reviews.title: Even Works in Sewer Water
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of great reviews of this Borescope and they're true. The image is excellent. The tip is waterproof. The quality is outstanding. Mine went swimming in sewer water, and still gave me a great image. For snaking through drain pipes, I recommend taping the tip to a plumbers snake - the cable is semi-rigid, but you won't be able to push it past maybe 6' of large pipe before it starts to fold on itself. The phone app was great too - simple to connect via WIFI. I love this borescope so much I bought two :-)
customer_reviews.author: B. Petrofsky

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. In the process of pulling duplo legos fron the indoor vacuum system. Using the hook tool. App is nice. Can rotate view, capture pics and video. Can grey into hd too. It's a little hard to maneuver through such a tough spot, but it holds its shape yet its pliable enough sodi the job. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: nbz59wr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent endoscope, superb customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the finest customer service I have encountered. The 1st unit shipped never was able to connect to my iPhone, but Depstech shipped me another replacement free of charge. The new endoscope immediately connects and the picture is superb. Excellent detail in the pictures and the app allows snapshots as well as detailed videos. I cannot express my gratitude to Deptech and in particular their rep. Sharon. High quality product but even higher quality company!
customer_reviews.author: David Stange

customer_reviews.title: Majority works but Accessories don't
customer_reviews.text: Like- Easy to connect to the App, App worked good. Dislike - Mirror attachment is useless unless you have ambient light. The hook attachment is cross threaded. When you try to wind it up and wrap the Velcro wraps around the cable it is almost impossible to get back in the box. The face of the camera is so sharp it catches on everything - (good luck going around a goose neck in plumbing). I don't believe that buying the extra length helps unless you have something to strap it to.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Portable flexible endoscope
customer_reviews.text: This endoscope broadcasts its own wifi signal that you connect to, allowing you to use it anywhere as long as it has power. It uses a companion app to view the broadcasted video, with minimal in app options. The light is controlled by a hardware scroll wheel built into the side of the battery pack. Overall a useful specialty tool, with decent construction and a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: App doesn’t recognize SSID.
customer_reviews.text: I tried multiple times to get it to link to my Wi-Fi. My SSID is 2 words, and the app wouldn’t take it. It is probably a good unit, but I couldn’t get it to work. I returned it and bought one that doesn’t require Wi-Fi. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Scotsman

customer_reviews.title: Wifi Setting
customer_reviews.text: For the price its almost too good to be true. Never expected quality to be as great as it is. Note in the setup it has Wifi name and password in the App. Simply charge device until green led goes out, Turn it on, and give it a few seconds as its own wifi sends out signal, search open wifi on your phone and select the name that's listed in directions and use password they give you. Super easy except instruction make it seem like you add info in App settings - its not as it has its own Wifi signal.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cool gadget.  Useful for multiple applications.
customer_reviews.text: Update: After contacting the company they reached out directly and offered me a replacement device which arrived within a week. Obviously they stand behind their product which is a great characteristic. Great little device, useful and cool. I have had it for 3 months and used it 5-6 times. Video and images are great and so are the pictures. Had an issue with a LED light but the company replace the item without issue.
customer_reviews.author: juancan

customer_reviews.title: See what's hidden
customer_reviews.text: Love this works great for many projects. Bright clear pictures get into spots you couldn't see before. Super easy to use trouble shooting problems you'd have to pay big money for someone to do the job. "Note" you will have to download the app to use it. Took me five minutes set up and started using it right off. I highly recommend this product see for yourself it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed to keep in my tool kit.
customer_reviews.text: Work's great for it's purpose. Good up close viewing and decent at a distance. For the price, it's a great option. I should have gotten a shorter version for my needs, but it's not used a lot. Maybe one day I will need the length. It won't stand on it's own for a long way but is just sturdy enough to manipulate the end to see in the right direction. Picture quayis just as you would expect from a decent but cheaper unit. Perfect for a cell phone pairing. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera.......But......
customer_reviews.text: It took me hours to figure out how to work this camera. I tried watching videos on you tube about this camera without success. The instructions are almost useless. I finally called my Son and he walked me through the installation and operating process. This camera so far is great. The picture quality is very sharp and does the job. I suggest that the manufacture put out a video showing the complete installation and operating process for people like me that aren't computer savey.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.  First unit didn't work.  Second unit sent for free!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and figured I would use it to look at the evap coil in my Tesla. It worked in my kitchen but as soon as I tried to make a video in the car the video kept getting corrupted like shown in other reviews. I tried to use my phone in airplane mode and it still didn’t help. I am returning it tomorrow. UPDATE! They sent me another unit for free. They have great customer support even though I had trouble with the first unit. Hopefully the new unit is better. I'll update when I have a reason to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect, despite confusion. Download Depstech Wifi app. Turn unit on, hold down wifi icon on phone, wait for unit to appear, click on unit ssid name and enter password provided. Open app and you are good to go. Quality of camera is great, and you can change resolutions in the app settings. Adjustable led lights with wheel on base unit is a great feature as well. Had some questions regarding this product, and the seller was quick to respond, and followed up to make sure I was happy. Great customer service. Excellent product with many uses.
customer_reviews.author: Curious in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for small spaces like attics that are unaccessible.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the only wireless cameras that have visibility that's not a couple inches only. That was the reason I chose this one over others. We have an attic that is too small to access so this was perfect for inspecting possible leaks. Very clear imagery and we were able to figure out what was going on without having to cut open large sections of our ceiling!
customer_reviews.author: Sven5000

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with my unit and it would not work. Their customer service was very responsive. After trying a few things we determined the unit must be defective. They immediately shipped out a replacement that I received within several days. The new unit worked beautifully. I was able to view down some pipes to determine where my problems were. I was able to record video and pictures for consultation which was quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to look into small holes without having to resort to destructive measures or extensive disassembly. Have found that the camera has lived up to all claims. I noticed that some were unhappy that they couldn’t save pictures to their picture folder. I simply take a screen shot and save it to photo folder. Would have appreciated a shorter focal length but more use may find a way to over come. For the price, this is really a five star product. But one always wishes for more.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Langan

customer_reviews.title: Saved big bucks
customer_reviews.text: My truck ac lever under dash broke. Th trouble was that I couldn't see it while upside down in truck cab. I got several expensive repair cost from shops. So I purchased DPSTECH to see if I could locate broken lever. The camera booted with no problems. After locating the broken lever I fixed it by using the camera to guide my hands. I got the ac working with no pproblems.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph a

customer_reviews.title: Not helpful
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cool concept and easy to connect/use but ultimately not really helpful. The field of view isn’t wide enough and it doesn’t focus close enough to make out what you’re looking at. You need a good 6” of unobstructed view to make out anything at all and even then you can’t really see the whole pipe. The more expensive units have an extremely wide angle lens that focuses very close so you can see the entire inside of the pipe in context. My kids use it to look at bugs in the yard and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I used this to inspect the inside of a tank. I had a hard time understanding what I was looking at, and because of the nature of how I had to enter this thing into the tank I wasn't able to point the camera in any particular direction. It did prove helpful though, and while I'll probably only need it on extremely rare occasions, it is a fantastic tool to have on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Tall Timbers

customer_reviews.title: Does its job!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product based on the price range and the features it provides. We we’re trying to fish the cables from our wall, and this little gem helped us tremendously with showing What’s behind the walls. We were able to drill holes properly with its help. Setup was easy. The phone app can be improved but it does its job as it is advertised. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: vikram.bartakke

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: I had some rodents get into the walls of the house and they attacked my central vacuum system. Looks like they like the cement Beam used on the joints as nothing else was hit... Anyways I could hear a sucking sound in the ceiling between upstairs and downstairs, and I was able to explore by sending this scope through a light box and find where the damage is so that I can repair the system with minimal collateral damage.
customer_reviews.author: Guargumon

customer_reviews.title: Fishing life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to fish same cat6 through a wall and fishished basement. Wouldn't have been able to complete the job without it. Was able to use this to hook a fish tape in the floor with fishtod and pulled it through. The viewing distance is probably about 2 feet in the dark. I got the 30ft one but it weighed our fishrods down when taped on to it. So it didn't do much good for the long run in this instance as we needed the option to go over ducting. Overall it was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Drew H.

customer_reviews.title: Clear view and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This endoscope worked great. Just download the app and you are using it. Very clear view of what you are looking at or for. I dropped a clip and screw while working on my car and I was able to find them quickly and retrieve with included hook attachment. I also used to see electric connection behind dishwasher without pulling dishwasher out.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond G. Winkowski

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for inspecting tight spaces or pipes. Great picture.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly easy to use with a great picture. I used it to scope a blocked bathroom sink pipe. I used the hook attachment to give a little space between the lens and the junk it was pushing through. It was very easy to clean the sludge left on the device. The light is bright enough and has proven to be water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up and use. Followed the directions and was right on. No problems so far and have used it about 20x's in walls and under sheds. For longer distances I usually tape it to a fiberglass rod so it is easy to manage over crevices or debris. The unit is pretty amazing for the price. Time will tell on the durability, but so far it has paid for itself 10x's over.
customer_reviews.author: Tutall

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: very poor image quality, even after adjusting the resolution setting. Grainy like an old VHS tape.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: endoscope
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully you all bought this for a practical reason. I have used it multiple times, works fine, holds a good charge and easy to use. I wish someone would come up with a way to flex the head in the direction you want it to go. But this works fine and would buy it again. I use it on an Iphone with no problems with the App from the APP store. I use the depstech app, there are others that say they can work but why bother.
customer_reviews.author: demotric

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool, but light shorted out quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very useful tool. I used it to hunt down some "lost" speaker wiring in my walls and ceiling. Sadly, the light quickly developed a short after a few adjustments to the angle of the cable, which made it rather unusable in those dark spaces. I returned the item and received a replacement - but it was missing all of the accessories, including charging cable. So I returned it as well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I got this just to look at where the break is in a water drain pipe. Its a subtle break, but I was able to identify it with this tool. Then I started to realize all the other uses I will have for it. Easy to set up. Camera quality adequate for the purposes. The attached photos are from low res setting video screen shots. Could have used the photo function, but it's easier to just let the video run and grab the stills you need out of that instead of trying to pay attention to guiding the camera AND snapping photos. I'd suggest buying an extension pole with this. My dog was no help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE instructions written in ridiculously small type and incomprehensible "English". Got an image initially on iPhone but now it has disappeared. Reached out to seller for help here via messaging with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Great little scope, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool little device for the price. My husband is a mechanic and I bought this for his birthday to use when he needs to see in tight spaces. At first the picture quality seemed blurry but we discovered that it is very clear for things close up, which is how you'd truly use it. The light is very bright and he was able to hook it up to his phone easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: My original purchased product was defective and once I communicated this to customer service, a replacement was sent immediately. While the replacement was en-route, the technical team also worked closely with me to ensure that the appropriate applications were installed and the phone settings were correct. Once out of the box, the replacement worked perfectly. A really high quality product and even better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kevin Selby

customer_reviews.title: Not as flexible as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to view in very narrow spaces. Positives: very good images and video quality, quick connect to app, good battery life. Negatives: camera cable is not as flxible/sturdy/strong as it says in amazon pictures. Its rather more soft. After about 2 feet of run, cable is not controlled direction to go and drops and bends to gravity. Length of 30 plus feet completely useless. Again not solid flxible as advertised. Will not guy again.
customer_reviews.author: Arif

customer_reviews.title: Must have if doing in wall work.
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes. I took a gamble on this and it paid off. Great way to look in walls. The cable is pretty bendy so I should have gotten the shorter one since there's no way to get it to stay straight for any length (I attached it to a steel fish tape for more reach). But software and image quality are great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Kite

customer_reviews.title: High quality video and all around quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The video quality is awesome and the focal length puts everything in focus, even close to camera. Light is adjustable and comes wirh a right angle mirror attachment and a hook attachment. I can’t believe the great quality for the low price. Definitely not your usual cheap Chinese knock off. WiFied to my iPhone quick and easy. I also got the case and it’s very high quality too. Few things exceed my expectations but this one did.
customer_reviews.author: promisekeeper

customer_reviews.title: Works about as I would expect
customer_reviews.text: The application is very simple but it does work. It took me a while to get it working because the instructions were not very clear. You have to connect to the device via your wifi before trying anything in the application which is a little confusing when first reading the instructions. I would give it 5 stars if it weren't for the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: J. Devore

customer_reviews.title: Great borescope for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money a great little borescope. Paired easily with an iPhone and Android, app is easy to use. Borescope is stiff and will hold a shape which helps you get it where you need it. Image quality isn't super sharp but picture quality is OK. Built in lights are plenty bright and adjustable. Mine paid for itself on the first day I took it to work.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Frush

customer_reviews.title: Entry level..First time user
customer_reviews.text: Tool as described. Great for entry level. Hard to control but this is my first borescope so could be user error/ nothing to compare it to. No focus, so camera quality COULD be better. iPhone 6plus no problems connecting out the box. Came with magnet hook mirror and extra pin in small plastic container. No case for scope, A LOT of cord.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Connect to DEPSTECH camera's Wi-Fi, not YOUR wifi
customer_reviews.text: Download app, turn camera on, connect to camera's Wi-Fi, password is 12345678, launch app, change resolution, save resolution, adjust brightness with thumb knob. Good to go... (if you are going to stick camera into yucky places have a towel and consider gloves when you pull camera out.)
customer_reviews.author: Team Indy

customer_reviews.title: not to bad..
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool product. And very useful. I bought it to put down my kitchen drain to find a clog. The only down fall I find is it does NOT turn corners so it was no help to me.. the camera kept getting stuck and not willing to go thru a bend. So in the end it was useless for that project.. but will be cool and useful for straight pipe projects I have..
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Larson

customer_reviews.title: Working great thus far
customer_reviews.text: This worked great in its first use for us on an iPad while trying to locate a leak within a shower wall. Had not used an endoscope previously, so it took some practice to learn how to manipulate the probe and recognize the orientation of the image. Had to charge it for a couple of hours before its first use. Video capture was flawless and ported directly into the iPad's camera roll.
customer_reviews.author: Martha H

customer_reviews.title: Not for sewer/plumbing pipes
customer_reviews.text: So o bought this to look for a blockage in a pipe. This camera is not good for it. Once in the pipe, the lens gets dirty and you have to pull it out to clean the lens. It is very flexible and it tends to bunch up in the pipes. I guess the only thing it's good for is looking in walls.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: How to retrieve pictures taken before you turn on save photos for Depstech App.
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. I took photos before turning on add APP pics to my Photos and though I had lost them. I was told to go into the Depstech App and the Pics were in there. I had to do a screen shot and then say done and it let me put the photos into my iphone 8 Photos. I found how to do a screen shoot on You Tube for my phone. Thank you Sharon from Depstech.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie R

customer_reviews.title: Great little thing for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and worked as advertised. Overall, The camera is solid and it does the job. The picture isn’t 4K, of course, but as long as your expectations are in check, It’s a great product. The cable is semi rigid and works well behind the walls in combo with fish tape. The LED and attachments can be helpful, and the connection to my iPhone (7) was fast and easy. What can you say? This is a utility product that helped me get the job done. Can’t say fairer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lexa

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof , or water friendly
customer_reviews.text: Looks Much nicer , camera quality is also better then my old depstech . Old scope-two years till lense cover broke from dropping it and is no longer waterproof . That spent time in oil, gas tanks, 6’ under water, inspecting props under boats. This new one lasted 3 minutes in 8” of water .. NOT waterproof, only temporarily sort of water resistant for a undetermined amount of time Was awesome ... till it wasn’t ( see pics )
customer_reviews.author: Pete S.

customer_reviews.title: impressive device
customer_reviews.text: Used this on 2 jobs to run some cables through solid ceilings. I had to tape it to my snake because it isn't stiff enough but it worked great. I wish the light was brighter. almost gave this 5 stars. great price for a handy tool Pros Good battery life does the job at a great price Cons light isn't bright enough have to tape it to a snake in order to go further than 2 ft. its not rigid enough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caution If You’re Buying For Use On Guns
customer_reviews.text: This product appears to work very well. However, I can’t speak definitely. I purchased this item to inspect the bores om my AR-15 and 9mm. Unfortunately, it was too large to fit either. I may have missed something in the specs but, in any case I gave it a 2 because it would not work in that application.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Review

customer_reviews.title: App suggests it will work with your Wi-FI network. It is wrong.
customer_reviews.text: The User Manual and IOS app says it will work with your Wi-Fi network, though the manual discourages it. What both should say is it only works with its own built-in SSID. So to use it you have to constantly change between your home network and its network. The IOS app locks up when attempting to change to a different network and requires that you terminate it and restart it, to get it to respond again, assuming you're willing to change your phone's SSID to use this device. If you can live with that caveat, it does seem to work as well as you'd expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A WOW PIECE OF TECH! I just received it, set it up on my iPad Pro and WOW. GREAT picture, great build material, heavy duty construction, recharable with significant Mh capacity. Long inspection line to run down a pipe or any other lengthy requirement. Inexpensive but worth a bunch more! If you need an inspection scope this is super. Really.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie S.

customer_reviews.title: I have no regrets of buying this product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is as advertised, I use it running electric wire up through the ceiling and looking in the wall cavities, used it to find fuel leak on vehicle before dropping tank. I would recommend this product and I am planning to buy one as a gift. My daughter really loved it and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: steve jones

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed with no hangups.
customer_reviews.text: A shop rag was sucked down the throat of my car carburetor. After taking off the intake manifold I was able to pull out what was left of it with tweezers and a pick. I never would have seen all the pieces with out this scope. It saved me a ton of time and money not having to pull off the cylinder head. The scpoe had none of the problems mentioned in some of the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used this product to inspect the air ducts in my house the first day I received it. This product worked great. I taped the camera to the end of a heavy duty water hose and pushed it through the duct would have been able to see and flaw it the duct if one were present. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler G.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, inexpensive camera scope for home repairs/improvements
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for the money. Semi-rigid cable is bendable. Built in light on camera head. Easy WiFi connectivity to phone app. Picture quality is good enough for purpose. This thing has saved me countless hours on multiple difficult in-wall wire-runs.
customer_reviews.author: Leadfoot

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic wasn't as durable as I would like to see, but for the cost I would say it exceeds expectations. The picture quality is great, however the frame rate is still lacking. The plastic vial that they put the accessories in ended up causing the mirror to be scratched and it is useless. Seriously for under $50 it's a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Cameron J.

customer_reviews.title: Go deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Your not going to film a movie on this, but, for what it's used for, picture quality is more than adequate. Battery lasts a looooong time. Had it for a year and haven't had to recharge it yet. Connects easily to the app. All in all, a good little unit.
customer_reviews.author: Madmox

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a must have in your tool box/cart works well with my smart phone, you can actually see the problem instead of guessing what the problem is, gotta say it's not a everyday item that can take the wear and tear of every day use. But for the money and affordability of it, it is worth to have it than not have anything at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fix it

customer_reviews.title: Working as advertised, no issues so far. I got what I expected. Comes with attachments.
customer_reviews.text: I have no issues so far and will surely update my review if I do encounter any and are unable to resolve with vendor. Great product as far as I can tell-- keep in mind it's my 1 and only endoscope experience. Neatly packaged, easy to follow instructions. The android app I downloaded form play store has name of product in title. Product is labeled with a WIFI name that included _********* but do not use that, just check for a similar name on your list of broadcasted WIFI once the unit is turned on and enter the password on the product's sticker. It comes with several little attachments. Pretty neato device.
customer_reviews.author: Greycat

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to check our pip, unfortunately the pip is too narrow so the camera couldn’t pass the elbow part(the camera head is not bendable, so be carful with the narrow pipe). But I have to say the camera is in very good quality and it gives you enough length.
customer_reviews.author: pdMeepo

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook to iPhone, probably work well on smaller pipe if it’s a straight shot. Tried using in a black washer drain pipe and was very difficult to see anything in it. But it will still be able to be used. Will work good on engine bay of car in areas I can’t see or sink drains etc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The focal distance works from a couple inches to infinity. I use it to check out things that are otherwise almost impossible to see. For example, I can see the water level in the batteries of my RV. The battery doesn't last terribly long, but it is adequate for a day's work.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gould

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera and it helped me on a few projects I had. Had a heater go out in the house and used it to check if the motor was spinning. I also moved a thermostat from one wall too another. It worked great. But I bought the 30' one and after a a while it's not strong enough to extend the full 30 feet down a drain. That's the only down side.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fedor

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other 5 star reviewers for the most part, so I won't waste your time with that information. It's a great camera, but part of my 5 star rating goes to their customer service, which was better than I've seen in a long time. They were happy to help with a problem I was having, and responded within a day.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Camera lacking real use
customer_reviews.text: Without being able to change and angles or zoom the camera is very limited especially where I needed it which was fishing wire through plaster wall. It followed the wall corder and is hard to turn
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous2001

customer_reviews.title: Great Visual scope Tool A+
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to look into small areas or behind objects that I can not see. The light is bright and adjustable, the image and colors are perfect for the application of use. The connection to wifi is awesome no problems with skipping or fuzzy images. Battery life is spot on for the amount of time I need to see what I need. A+. I purchased this item and use it often. if you found this helpful please indicate. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: J. Cart

customer_reviews.title: Better picture then the pros
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a sewer line inspection, unfortunately for me the end of the camera kept getting covered in grossness. This was in no way due to the device. I had a professional company come to do the inspection a day later and their scope had the same issue. The picture quality on this scope was actually better then the one the pros brought in. Glad I own this one.
customer_reviews.author: meghan hernandez

product_meta.title: DEPSTECH 1200P Semi-Rigid Wireless Endoscope, 2.0 MP HD WiFi Borescope Inspection Camera,16 inch Focal Distance & 2200mAh Battery Snake Camera for Android & iOS Smartphone Tablet - Black 33FT

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
